features.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
features.description: Built with security and trust at its core, our platform ensures every certificate verification is accurate, fast, and reliable.

secure.title: Tamper-Proof Security
secure.description: Advanced encryption and unique identifiers prevent certificate forgery and duplication.

instant.title: Instant Verification
instant.description: Verify any certificate in seconds using our search or QR code scanning system.

qrCode.description: Each certificate includes a unique QR code for quick mobile verification.

official.description: All certificates are digitally signed and officially validated by the issuing authority.

hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: We are dedicated to building trust through secure, transparent, and accessible digital certificate verification.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.title: Eliminating Certificate Fraud Worldwide
mission.description: Our mission is to create a world where every certificate can be instantly verified, eliminating fraud and building trust between institutions and individuals. We believe that authentic credentials should be easily verifiable by anyone, anywhere.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the global standard for digital certificate verification, trusted by institutions, employers, and individuals worldwide.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do at FIBQ.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We maintain the highest standards of data security and certificate authenticity.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Every verification is traceable and our processes are fully transparent.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Free public access to certificate verification for everyone, anywhere.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: 99.9% verification accuracy backed by advanced validation systems.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From a small project to a global verification platform.
